channel.title: Deltascape adding quest? Wont appear

item.title: Deltascape adding quest? Wont appear
item.dc:creator: @kedonot1 kedonot1
item.description:
@kedonot1 wrote:

Heres a copy of my Texthandler

im trying to add a x-mas quest…
It wont appear.
Someone help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2008, 09:31:22 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 10, 2008, 03:18:36 pm[/size][hr]Please anyone
